data.name: 10 Minutes Till Dawn
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist the Full Version

The full version will include more characters, weapons, enemies, and game modes!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1966900/20_Minutes_Till_Dawn/


About the Game


Survive the onslaught of an endless horde of monsters for 10 minutes! This is the free version of 20 Minutes Till Dawn.

Unique Builds Every Run

In this roguelite survival game, select from a variety of upgrades to create a unique and overpowered builds every run. You can be a fire wizard, for example, and ignite monsters with every pump of your shotgun, or an agile ninja who controls magic knives to pierce your enemies.

Select Your Hero

Choose from a diverse selection of characters and weapons that offer a variety of gameplay experiences.

Features

  • Over 50 different upgrades too choose from for a unique experience every run!
  • Wide cast of characters, with more to come post-launch.
  • Casual quick 5-10 minute play sessions, for busy gamers.

What is the difference between "10 Minutes Till Dawn" and the full version "20 Minutes Till Dawn"?

  • 3 more Characters
  • 3 more Weapons
  • At least 16 more normal upgrades
  • "Synergy" upgrades that require specific combinations of upgrades to unlock.
  • Character exclusive upgrades
  • More enemy/boss variety
  • Stat boosts and passives that persist in between runs. Purchasable with the in-game currency.
  • Difficulty levels (like the Slay the Spire ascension system if you're familiar with that)
  • Achievements
  • And of course, runs will be 20 Minutes. There will still be a 10 Minute mode for people that prefer the shorter play session

data.short_description: Shoot down an ever growing horde of Lovecraftian monsters. Choose from a variety of upgrades to create unique and game-breaking builds. Unlock a diverse cast of characters and weapons with unique powers.
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
